directDrive

public void directDrive(double leftCmps,
                        double rightCmps)
Directly move the robot at said speed, called by DriveTrain. You _must_ fill this in. Otherwise the robot will not be able to move.

Specified by:
directDrive in class MovementPlugin
Parameters:
leftCmps - The desired speed of the left wheel in centimeters-per-second
rightCmps - The desired speed of the right wheel in centimeters-per-second

freeze

public void freeze()
The create has no freeze api. So this essentially calls kill()

Specified by:
freeze in class MovementPlugin
See Also:
MovementPlugin.kill()

getLeftMinCmps

public double getLeftMinCmps()
Should get the minimum velocity in centimeters-per-second for the right wheel of the robot. (read: < 0) By default returns the negative value of getLeftMaxCmps.

Overrides:
getLeftMinCmps in class MovementPlugin
Returns:
The speed in cmps
See Also:
MovementPlugin.getLeftMaxCmps(), MovementPlugin.getRightMinCmps(), MovementPlugin.getRightMaxCmps()

Should get the minimum velocity in centimeters-per-second for the right wheel of the robot. (read: < 0) By default returns the negative value of getRightMaxCmps.

Overrides:
